page.title: 11HARLOW TOWN PARK .
page.content: Harlow Town Park offers in its 164 acres a wide range of facilities .For{ children there is an adventure play- ground with slides ,swings and mazes, and a pets corner with many animals. Then there is a mini golf course and a roller-skating rink close by Spurriers Cafe ,open for refreshments during the day.In the centre of the park is a bandstand where free concerts are held all summer; there is also a pub and Youth Hostel. A little stream starts from the fish ponds near the swimming and paddling pools.It flows right down through the park ,past many lovely flower beds.the park then extends over the railway bridge to the River Stort.Adjacent is the Moorhen Boating Centre and the Outdoor Pursuites Centre.Here you can row,canoe,windsurf or climb. We are lucky to have such a park .
